MCQ: What is the study of living organisms called?
Choices: a: Biology | b: Chemistry | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which organelle is known as the powerhouse of the cell?
Choices: a: Nucleus | b: Mitochondria | c: Ribosome | d: Endoplasmic reticulum

MCQ: What is the process by which plants make their own food called?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Respiration | c: Digestion | d: Fermentation

MCQ: Which scientist is known for his theory of evolution by natural selection?
Choices: a: Isaac Newton | b: Charles Darwin | c: Gregor Mendel | d: Louis Pasteur

MCQ: What is the genetic material found in all living organisms?
Choices: a: DNA | b: RNA | c: Protein | d: Carbohydrate
